website_summaries.verdict: A quality entry-level package for an exceptional price. Fits the bill for most amateurs and occasional users.
pros: Functional machine with budget price for children and amateurs
cons: Sounds best when turned to highest volume
Lacks features and accessories of higher-priced models

customer_reviews.title: Best Karaoke
customer_reviews.text: I've bought multiple Karaoke machines and I've always been disappointed with the quality of the sound. This is by far the best karaoke I have ever used. The speaker is phenomenal , never sounds static. I also love the colors! I have a lot of parties and this is one of the main attractions :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update- I lowered to 3 stars because the microphone only worked for one day. Now I find myself ordering a replacement. For the one day it worked my child had a blast. FYI this was shipped in the product box. They slapped a shipping sticker on the side and mailed it. It took a beating so now the box looks used and this is a gift. I still give it 4 stars because I tested it and it works and the lights are a neat feature.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It worked one time after that one night the speaker and mic went out so all I have is lights it's a complete waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few days
customer_reviews.text: The features are cool, voice changes, we connected a bluetooth device just fine. We hooked up to TV hoping the lyrics from our bluetooth device could stream on the TV but it didn't. The TV hookup is just if you have a USB with CD-G songs. We had fun with it until one day it just wouldn't turn on. We tried everything, but it wouldn't work. I recommend buying the insurance because while I was getting it packed up to ship back to Amazon for a refund, it accidentally dropped about 3-feet onto hard floor and cracked. It was fun while it lasted but I'll be staying away from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Guev

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Very much a “plastic” feel to it. It just feels cheaply made. I expected a lot more for the money. Don’t waste your time, they have better stuff at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Soreano

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy for children to operate! Connects easily to Bluetooth to play songs from YouTube. CDs work great. I bought an extra Singing Maxhine mic, and both microphones work at the same time. My 7 and 5 year old love this.
customer_reviews.author: Morgann Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Way fun night
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my son who turned 10. He said at first he would not sing. But after the rest of the family got it out and started to sing he got sooo into it. We had such a blast. We mainly used the Bluetooth feature and sang songs with lyrics off YouTube. Need to figure out how to buy a second mic because we all wanted a turn. Super fun kereokee machine
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Have

customer_reviews.title: Micro phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece, and it is wonderful. The lights are so much fun and the sound is excellent. The volume is loud but not too much. My 8 year old niece was able to pick it up from room to room. Only part is the microphone is not cordless so my niece has to stand close to the dock. But all in it I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a 6 year old girl who likes to sing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this karaoke machine for my granddaughter. She loves it. Her parents had to set it up - blue tooth and all. I think this was one of the best presents she received for Hanukkah.
customer_reviews.author: E P

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I had to send my first one back because there was a problem with the volume button cutting off and on by itself. Also the CD player was starting to skip on perfectly functioning CD’s after a couple of weeks. The second unit I received arrived with a non-functioning CD player. I kept it because we decided to use the USB port and it’s still running strong.. This unit works but Idon’t expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Still working well
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our grandkids (2&6) for Christmas. We have an apartment in their home and see them daily. It stays in our apartment so we know how well it works. We have had no problems with it yet. The kids like it a lot. The sound isn’t great but they don’t notice. Our son did the set up easily. We bought an extra microphone and both are still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: 6 Year Old in Musical Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our 6 year old. The adults actually took over karaoke on Christmas. We've had it for 3 weeks now and it's working fine. It's also very durable for an active six year old only child with his own one- person band lol. Worth the money to see him sooooo happy. FYI- He also received a drum set so he literally plays and sings at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas and it stopped powering on after about 4 months of use. I bought the protection plan when I bought it for her, but the company that it was through denied my claim and wouldn't replace it. I wouldn't recommend this or the protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Karaoke/PA/Player system
customer_reviews.text: We really like this thing. It plays all CDs well, the BlueTooth hookup to my phone makes it very flexible. The sound is quite good. My grandkids can use it pretty effectively and love singing with it. I have read that the App is a pain but I have found it to be very useful and versatile without the app. Only complaint is that the buttons are hard to read what they are for. It would be much better if they were backlit or at least more contrasting characters.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nieling

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for Christmas. He's used it maybe 5 times in total and it's already broken. The mic cuts in and out like there's a bad connection. I understand it's cheap but 90 minutes of use shouldn't break it 😑
customer_reviews.author: Amber Shaddix

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a month and we did the Bluetooth pairing. But now it won’t work. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: After 1 hr no power.
customer_reviews.text: My order was delivered and it only worked for 1 hrs and stopped working. I could not turn on. I may not be lucky.
customer_reviews.author: JEROME AFI

customer_reviews.title: Broken Machine
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a Christmas gift for our son. The machine broke after one week. It would not start. After receiving the replacement it broke again after 2 weeks. Rather than making a third attempt with the machine we gave up and threw it out and called it a loss. When it did work, the sound quality was great! Only plus side we had using the machine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for the price, my 5 year old can work it perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 6 ur old loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for christmas for our 6 year old daughter and she turns it on and plays with it along with our 3 yrs old daughter. Hooks to the TV easy to use, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: SourDOugh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandkids for Christmas...the sound is great and the lights are fantastic! Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: John R Gould

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly, lyrics wont play on screen.
customer_reviews.text: NOT USER FRIENDLY. LYRICS WONT PLAY ON SCREEN, EVEN DOWNLOADED APPS. I JUST WANTED TO STREAM MY YOUTUBE LYRICS ONTO THE BUILT IN SCREEN . IS THAT SO HARD OR TOO MUCH TO ASK??!! RETURNING.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Save money...
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after two days. Bought this for my sister for Christmas and she LOVED it because of the awesome sound effects. But when it quits working for no reason I’m obviously upset. They did send another and so far it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: b. pollard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it.
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally plugged in 12 V instead of nine which killed it. You would think there would be overvoltage protection built in like quality equipment would. Taking it apart I found a repair they made in the factory how ridiculous. Taking it apart I found a repair they made in the factory how ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Edward J Baum

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this machine. It's compact and has blue tooth capabilities. This was her favorite Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My only complaint is I wish the microphone volume went higher.
customer_reviews.author: Sasa

customer_reviews.title: Singing along
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Did not mean to order two , was going to send one back but ended up liking it so much we just set the accidental order up in another room and now the kids use it so sing , change their voices and talk to one another.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great little box with a lot of boom
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bluetooth worked well pairing in and out with several different devices. Great speaker quality!
customer_reviews.author: Audra J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: We love this singing machine. Easy to use and easy to transport to where ever the kids decide they want to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Such fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our party! Love the ease that even kids can use it!
customer_reviews.author: BeachLovers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter. She absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carmel M. Tanguay

customer_reviews.title: Great Karaoke Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Has been an awesome gift for my kids, good sound quality and bluetooth is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Becka P

customer_reviews.title: hard to set up, sad kid on christmas
customer_reviews.text: this machine wouldn't connect via bluetooth to any of our devices, we tried iphone, ipad, kindle you name it. This was my daughter's big christmas gift and she's so bummed that we can't get any music to play out of it. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old LOVES this! Still trying to figure out how to get song volume louder. Was easy to sync with devices and apps
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: For those who love to sing along.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts my daughter could have gotten for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: OleLittle108

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working only a few weeks after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Was great until it stopped working only a few weeks after purchasing 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. Its phone for my kids. Like the voice changer.
customer_reviews.author: another parent

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 6year old Granddaughter and she loves it,
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item. Bought it for my 3 year old grandson . Easy to set up and use. Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O’Neal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves it works great and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product!! We love it! Great CD player along with the Blue tooth feature makes any song available! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Great way to have fun
customer_reviews.text: The sound for this device is amazing. It shows different colored lights and its light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Timbuktu

customer_reviews.title: This system would be ok for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high quality system ok for kids
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the machine. It says you can view the words on your T.V. screen, but it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Stopped turning on after only a few times. I read several reviews, but thought if we were gentle with it we would be the exception. Not true
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Davis

customer_reviews.title: Daughter was very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Microphone did not work after two days. Alot of static. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Valentine

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price and we love the added color vibes..I would recommend this to others...even for adults who want to karaoke.
customer_reviews.author: deeann allison

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift and it stopped working already. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That if you try to sing loud I have a glitch and it turns off
customer_reviews.text: The Quality of this product is horrible. If you try and sing loud is turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in less than 6 months. Was used only a handful of times. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Do not reccomend this one
customer_reviews.text: Not such a great buy. Sound sucks. Connection works. Basic model.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

product_meta.title: Singing Machine SML682BTW Groove Cube CDG Karaoke System, White, (SML682BTWD)
product_meta.description: Size:Groove Cube| Color:WhiteThe Groove comes packed with awesome features for you to create fun-lasting singable moments. The Groove lets you play your music CDs and CDGs or stream audio via your Bluetooth compatible devices. Follow the karaoke lyrics on your TV screen via the included RCA cables. Record your voice performances to the integrated USB jack. Built with over 40 multi-colored LED lights on front grill, sides, and handle that synchronize to the music plus speakers in wood cabinets for a crispy sound, the Groove is your party in the box!
feature_bullets: Secure resting cradle fits a variety of tablets or other mobile devices
Supports two microphones with separate volume control for duets
Echo control for Enhanced vocal effects
Line-in to connect to your personal Mp3, smartphone, or other audio devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars321 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
